example.eg: Naomi unexpectedly announced that she did not want to attend her friend's wedding.
example.egtrans: 娜奥米忽然声称，她不想去参加自己朋友的婚礼。

example.eg: Rebecca couldn't wait to announce her engagement to James.
example.egtrans: 丽贝卡迫不及待地要公布她与詹姆斯订婚的消息。

example.eg: The MC will announce the winners of the raffle at 11:00.
example.egtrans: 主持人将在11:00时宣布彩票获奖者。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 宣布, 公布（优胜者等）

example.eg: Crocuses announce the arrival of spring.
example.egtrans: 番红花开了，说明春天到了。
